definition: having power or capacity or tendency to absorb or soak up something (liquids or energy etc.), a material having capacity or tendency to absorb another substance
details:
adjective
- having power or capacity or tendency to absorb or soak up something (liquids or energy etc.)
= example: having power or capacity or tendency to absorb or soak up something (liquids or energy etc.)
= synonyms: absorptive
noun
- a material having capacity or tendency to absorb another substance
